ğŸ—£ Aziz yurtdoshlar! Barchangizni tariximizning unutilmas sanasi â€“ davlatimiz suvereniteti va milliy gâ€˜ururimiz timsoli boâ€˜lgan Madhiyamiz qabul qilingan kun bilan samimiy muborakbod etamiz.

ğŸ¼ Madhiya â€“ shunchaki musiqiy asar emas, u erkimiz, ozodligimiz va buyuk ajdodlarimiz merosiga boâ€˜lgan cheksiz hurmatimiz ifodasidir. Uning har bir misrasida xalqimizning matonati, donishmandligi va yorugâ€˜ kelajakka boâ€˜lgan ishonchi mujassam.

âœ…Yurtimiz tinch, osmonimiz musaffo boâ€˜lsin! Istiqlolimiz qoâ€˜shigâ€˜i â€“ Madhiyamiz dunyo uzra baralla yangrab, xalqimizni yangi zafarlarga ruhlantirib tursin!

translations.en:
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Congratulations on the 33rd anniversary of the adoption of the National Anthem of the Republic of Uzbekistan!

ğŸ—£ Dear compatriots! We sincerely congratulate all of you on the unforgettable date of our history - the day of adoption of our Anthem, which is a symbol of our state's sovereignty and national pride.

ğŸ¼ Anthem is not just a piece of music, it is an expression of our freedom, freedom and our boundless respect for the legacy of our great ancestors. Each of his verses embodies the courage, wisdom and faith of our people in a bright future.

May our country be peaceful and our sky clear! Let the song of our independence - let our anthem resound throughout the world and inspire our people to new victories!

ğŸŒÂ  my.gov.uz | egov.uz
